item_box.desc: Use this to get a random item!

wood.desc: Basic resource used for crafting many items.

wood_bundle.desc: Bundle of 5 `wood`. Good for saving inventory space!

recruit.desc: Given when you create an account! Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

light_pack.desc: Equip this backpack to gain **5** item slots!

9mm_fmj.desc: 9x19mm cartridge. Common round used in pistols. Use with weapon.

bat.desc: Can be used without ammo. Deals `12` bonus damage if you have a `baseball`.
bat.phrase: **ITS A GRAND SLAM!** {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` directly at {victim}'s face using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`. **{damage}** damage dealt!

bow.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

steel.desc: A cheap but strong material used to craft items.

steel_bundle.desc: Bundle of 5 `steel`. Good for saving inventory space!

cloth.desc: Fibrous material used for crafting items such as clothing.

cloth_bundle.desc: Bundle of 5 `cloth`. Good for saving inventory space!

looter.desc: Inventory banner that can only be bought. Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

xp_potion.desc: Use this to instantly gain `75` xp!

glock.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

revolver.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

7.62_fmj.desc: 7.62x39mm full metal jacket ammo for 7.62 caliber rifles.

crossbow.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

remington_870.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

12g_buckshot.desc: 12 Gauge buckshot shell. Used for shotguns.

grenade.phrase: {attacker} blew {victim} to bits using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

screw.desc:
Metal pin used to hold objects together.
Crafting component for creating items using the `craft` command.

screw_bundle.desc: Bundle of 5 `screw`'s. Good for saving inventory space!

smg_body.desc: Parts used to craft smaller automatic weapons.

killer.desc: Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

elite.desc: Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

canvas_bag.desc: Equip this backpack to gain **15** item slots!

thompson.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

ak47.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

iron_shield.desc: Shields you from attacks for 2 hours.

7.62_hp.desc: 7.62x39mm hollow-point bullet. Hollow-point rounds expand on impact, causing more damage.

.45_ap.desc: .45 ACP AP cartridge. Use with weapon.

12g_slug.desc: 12 Gauge slug shell. Used for shotguns.

spas.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

m4a1.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

ultra_box.desc: This box drops an item of at least Rare quality, or potentially an Ultra item.

care_package.desc:
A supply drop that may infrequently land in your server after requesting them.
Can only be looted by the first person to claim it.
Has a high chance of containing legendary items.

gunpowder.desc: Makes things go boom. Useful for crafting ammunition.

rifle_body.desc: Parts used to craft high damage rifles.

assault_body.desc: Parts used to craft high damage automatic weapons.

hikers_pack.desc: Equip this backpack to gain **25** item slots!

desert_eagle.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

awp.phrase: {attacker} fires a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}` straight at {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

gold_shield.desc: Shields you from attacks for 8 hours.

rpg.phrase: {attacker} blew {victim} to bits using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}` loaded with a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

javelin.phrase: {attacker} blew {victim} to bits using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}` loaded with a {ammoIcon}`{ammo}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

7.62_7n23.desc: 7.62x39mm black-tip bullet designed to penetrate steel.

.50ae_hp.desc: .50 Action Express hollow-point ammunition for handguns.

peck_seed.desc: This rare seed has the ability to turn your opponent into a chicken for 2 hours, disabling any use of their commands.

reroll_scroll.desc: Use this to reset your skills! Resetting your skills will also reset the cost to purchase skills with the `upgrade` command.

fiber_optics.desc: Thin glass fibers used to transmit signals.

module.desc: A piece of machinery used for various tech.

supply_signal.desc: A signal used to call in an immediate airdrop. Be careful though, the airdrop can still be stolen by other players the same way a real airdrop can.

hitman.desc: For only the best. Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

master.desc: Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

cyber_pack.desc: Equip this backpack to gain **40** item slots!

rail_cannon.desc: Uses electromagnetic force to blast a ball of plasma that vaporizes anything it touches.
rail_cannon.phrase: {attacker} vaporizes {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}` loaded with {ammoIcon}`{ammo}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

ray_gun.desc: A lightweight particle-beam weapon that disintegrates targets on contact.
ray_gun.phrase: {attacker} vaporizes {victim} using a {weaponIcon}`{weapon}` loaded with {ammoIcon}`{ammo}`! **{damage}** damage dealt!

c4.desc:
Use this on another clan to temporarily lower their current power by **5** for 1 hour, making them vulnerable to a raid.

This effect can stack.

stocking.desc:
Has a chance to contain `500 - 2,000` Lootcoin
**Christmas event item**

gingerbread.desc:
Eat this to heal `20-25` HP!
**Christmas event item**

candycane.desc:
Sharpened for maximum efficiency
**Christmas event item**

nutcracker.desc:
Send the nutcracker to bite your enemies
**Christmas event item**

mittens.desc:
Wear these cozy gloves to shield yourself for 30 minutes!
**Christmas event item**

coal.desc:
You were on the naughty list!
**Christmas event item**

present.desc:
Unwrap it to see what's inside!
**Christmas event item**

token.desc:
Limited event currency that can be used to buy event-only items!
Check the `store` to see what can be purchased

easter_egg.desc:
Has a chance to contain `300 - 1,500` Lootcoin!
**Easter event item**

bunny.desc:
Send this rabid bunny to chomp your foes...  
**Easter event item**

carrot.desc:
Eat this healthy carrot to heal `17-25` HP!
**Easter event item**

golden_egg.desc:
This rare golden easter egg has a chance to contain `5,000 - 20,000` Lootcoin.
**Easter event item**

candy_egg.desc:
Delicious chocolate candy eggs that heal `22-30` HP when you eat them!
**Easter event item**

tnt_egg.desc:
Do not be fooled, this egg has enough gunpowder in it to destroy a small house. Throw it at an enemy to unleash its deadly force.
**Easter event item**

apple.desc:
Someone seriously gave you an apple... You can eat it to gain `9-13` HP.
**Halloween event item**

pumpkin.desc:
A pumpkin! You could make a jack-o'-lantern... Or you could just eat it to gain `15-30` HP.
**Halloween event item**

candy_bar.desc:
A king-sized candy bar! Heals `13-28` HP.
**Halloween event item**

spider.desc:
A real spider. Toss it at someone to make them scream!
**Halloween event item**

scythe.desc:
It's meant for reaping crops, but I think we all know what you'll be using it for.
**Halloween event item**

candy_pail.desc: A trick-or-treat pail. It could contain some cool Halloween items!

spooky.desc:
Very spooky banner...
Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

kofi_king.desc: Get this banner by donating on [Ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/blobfysh)! Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!

patron.desc: Exclusive banner for [patrons](https://www.patreon.com/lootcord)! Equip this to give your inventory a fresh new look!
